case.title: Any Asian Ladies? - 34 (London)
case.text: I am looking to meet a mature Asian lady. I am mid 30's Caucasian, articulate and clean with a good sense of humor. Looking to meet someone intelligent, sensual, adventurous that can hold a conversation and also understands no strings doesn't mean unfeeling. You are likely to be 35 to 55, average to slim build. Have a sense of humour & just as likely to be found at a gallery as in the gym. So if you like your men tall then we may have a starting point. Write back telling me something about yourself and what your looking for. Please put "Mature" in the subject line to help me weed out the spam.
